citations.narrative:
A section of exposed landscaping mesh fabric was identified in the outdoor portion of one enclosure. This was observed
in a sloped area of the yard, where the gravel was not completely covering the underlying landscape material. The
enclosure housed 13 puppies, some of which were observed chewing on the frayed edges of the material. This could
cause injury to the puppies if they were to become entangled in the frayed areas. In addition, the puppies could become ill
if the material was to be ingested. Primary enclosures must be kept in good repair to protect the animals from injury. The
licensee must correct this issue.
********Correct by March 26, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
A section of exposed landscaping mesh fabric was identified in the outdoor portion of one enclosure. This was observed 
in a sloped area of the yard, where the gravel was not completely covering the underlying landscape material. The 
enclosure housed 13 puppies, some of which were observed chewing on the frayed edges of the material. This could 
cause injury to the puppies if they were to become entangled in the frayed areas. In addition, the puppies could become ill 
if the material was to be ingested. Primary enclosures must be kept in good repair to protect the animals from injury. The 
licensee must correct this issue.  
********Correct by March 26, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
